overview: TRACKLIST:  No Love Lost  Edge Of Darkness  This Mortal Coil  Reek Of Putrefaction  The Granulating Dark Satanic Mills  Captive Bolt Pistol  Black Star  Keep On Rotting In The Free World  Ruptured In Purulence  Heartwork
tagline: Live at Rockpalast Amphitheater, Gelsenkirchen, Germany - 2014.06.07
title: Carcass: Rock Hard Festival
